DOC.HEADLINE: No Russian or US role in Kyrgyz violence: Bakiyev tells AFP

TEXT.P: Russia and the United States played no role in this week's revolt in Kyrgyzstan, the country's ousted President Kurmanbek Bakiyev told AFP in an exclusive interview here Friday.
"I do not believe that Russia or the United States of America had a hand in these issues," Bakiyev said.
Both countries maintain military facilities in the strategic Central Asian state.
